name: Videocart-12: Baseball
overview: Our Baseball game gives you nine (or more) innings to practice your timing, mix-up your pitches, shift your outfield... major league thrills with the comfort of home! It's Dizzy Dean, master of the fast ball, versus you! Common sandlot slugger. He winds up, throws... and WHACK! Straight over the center field fence! He should have tried a spit ball.
